original_text: So the man went away. He began to speak to many people in the region called ‘The ten cities’. He told them about the great things that Jesus had done for him. All the people were very surprised.
korean_text: 그가 가서 예수께서 자기에게 어떻게 큰 일 행하셨는지를 데가볼리에 전파하니 모든 사람이 놀랍게 여기더라

sentences.original_text: He began to speak to many people
in the region called 'The ten cities'.
He told them about the great things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 위대한 일들에 대해 말했는데

sentences.original_text: that Jesus had done for him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 예수께서 그를 위해 하신 일들이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: All the people were very surprised.
